Schedule

  • Floor Fee
    $10 per night open fencing
  • Club Membership (Includes equipment rental, open fencing and stamina training)
    • Individual: $40/month
    • Family Membership: First member $40/month, $25/month per additional family member
  • Beginner Lessons Hours
    • Tuesday 6pm - 7pm
    • Saturday 10am - 11am
    • Sunday 12:30pm - 1:30pm
  • Group Lesson
    • 1 lesson per week for 4 weeks: $100
    • 2 lessons per week for 4 weeks: $140 ($200 to add four 20 mins private lessons)
    • 3 lessons and more per week for 4 weeks: $180 ($240 to add four 20 mins private lessons)
  • Private Lesson
    • $20 for 20 mins
  • We Also Have Drum Lessons!
    • Every Tuesday 4:30pm - 8:30pm
    • $25 for 30 min, $45 for 60min
  • Tournament Travel Fees
    (If​ ​students​ ​need​ ​a​ ​ride​ ​an​ ​additional​ ​$20​ ​will​ ​be​ ​added.​ ​All​ ​events require​ ​a​ ​minimum​ ​of​ ​3​ ​students​ ​for​ ​coach​ ​travel.)
    • Local
      ​Tournaments,​ ​which​ ​are​ ​considered​ ​tournament​ ​within​ ​100 miles​ ​of​ ​MFC​ ​will​ ​cost​ ​$35​ ​per​ ​fencer​ ​for​ ​the​ ​first​ ​event​ ​per​ ​day​ ​and​ ​an extra​ ​$10​ ​for​ ​an​ ​additional​ ​event​ ​the​ ​same​ ​day.
    • Super Youth Circuit
      ​Tournaments,​ ​which​ ​are​ ​regional​ ​tournaments that​ ​give​ ​national​ ​points​ ​and​ ​are​ ​required​ ​for​ ​qualification​ ​to​ ​Summer Nationals.​ ​There​ ​is​ ​a​ ​$60​ ​per​ ​event​ ​flat​ ​fee.
    • North​ ​American​ ​Cups/Nationals​
      ​National​ ​tournaments​ ​provide athletes​ ​with​ ​the​ ​most​ ​exposure​ ​to​ ​the​ ​highest​ ​level​ ​of​ ​competition​ ​and allows​ ​them​ ​to​ ​obtain​ ​national​ ​point​ ​and​ ​ranking.​ ​There​ ​is​ ​a​ ​$100​ ​flat fee​ ​per​ ​event.
    • International​
      ​​The​ ​tournaments​ ​allow​ ​fencers​ ​to​ ​not​ ​only​ ​represent MFC​ ​but​ ​also​ ​our​ ​country.​ ​This​ ​gives​ ​the​ ​fencers​ ​an​ ​opportunity​ ​to​ ​gain world​ ​points​ ​and​ ​ranking​ ​as​ ​well​ ​as​ ​national​ ​points​ ​and​ ​a​ ​chance​ ​to qualify​ ​for​ ​a​ ​National​ ​Team.​ ​The​ ​cost​ ​will​ ​be​ ​$200​ ​per​ ​fencer​ ​per​ ​day​ ​of competition.​ ​Hotel,​ ​airfare​ ​and​ ​ground​ ​transportation​ ​expenses​ ​will​ ​be divided​ ​by​ ​the​ ​number​ ​of​ ​events​ ​per​ ​fencers​ ​total.

**All membership, class and lesson fees are non-refundable.**

**All returned checks will incur a $25 processing fee**

**Please make payments at the 1st lesson of the month**
